00078 /* View3d->modeselect 
00079  * This is a bit of a dodgy hack to enable a 'mode' menu with icons+labels
00080  * rather than those buttons.
00081  * I know the implementation's not good - it's an experiment to see if this
00082  * approach would work well
00083  *
00084  * This can be cleaned when I make some new 'mode' icons.
00085  */

00087 /* view3d handler codes */

00089 #define VIEW3D_HANDLER_PROPERTIES   2
00090 #define VIEW3D_HANDLER_OBJECT       3
00091 #define VIEW3D_HANDLER_PREVIEW      4
00092 #define VIEW3D_HANDLER_MULTIRES     5
00093 #define VIEW3D_HANDLER_TRANSFORM    6
00094 #define VIEW3D_HANDLER_GREASEPENCIL 7
00095 #define VIEW3D_HANDLER_BONESKETCH   8

00099 static void do_view3d_header_buttons(bContext *C, void *arg, int event);
00100 
00101 #define B_SCENELOCK 101
00102 #define B_FULL      102
00103 #define B_HOME      103
00104 #define B_VIEWBUT   104
00105 #define B_PERSP     105
00106 #define B_MODESELECT 108
00107 #define B_SEL_VERT  110
00108 #define B_SEL_EDGE  111
00109 #define B_SEL_FACE  112
00110 #define B_MAN_TRANS 116
00111 #define B_MAN_ROT   117

00113 #define B_NDOF      119
00114 #define B_MAN_MODE  120
00115 #define B_REDR      122
00116 #define B_NOP       123

00118 // XXX quickly ported across
00119 static void handle_view3d_lock(bContext *C) 
00120 {
00121     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00122     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00123     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00124     View3D *v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00125     
00126     if (v3d != NULL && sa != NULL) {
00127         if (v3d->localvd == NULL && v3d->scenelock && sa->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D) {
00128             /* copy to scene */
00129             scene->lay = v3d->lay;
00130             scene->layact = v3d->layact;
00131             scene->camera = v3d->camera;
00132 
00133             /* not through notifier, listener don't have context
00134              * and non-open screens or spaces need to be updated too */
00135             BKE_screen_view3d_main_sync(&bmain->screen, scene);
00136             
00137             /* notifiers for scene update */
00138             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_LAYER, scene);
00139         }
00140     }
00141 }
00142 
00149 static void view3d_layers_editmode_ensure(Scene *scene, View3D *v3d)
00150 {
00151     /* sanity check - when in editmode disallow switching the editmode layer off since its confusing
00152      * an alternative would be to always draw the editmode object. */
00153     if (scene->obedit && (scene->obedit->lay & v3d->lay) == 0) {
00154         int bit;
00155         for (bit = 0; bit < 32; bit++) {
00156             if (scene->obedit->lay & (1 << bit)) {
00157                 v3d->lay |= 1 << bit;
00158                 break;
00159             }
00160         }
00161     }
00162 }
00163 
00164 static int view3d_layers_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00165 {
00166     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00167     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00168     View3D *v3d = sa->spacedata.first;
00169     int nr = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "nr");
00170     int toggle = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "toggle");
00171     
00172     if (nr < 0)
00173         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00174 
00175     if (nr == 0) {
00176         /* all layers */
00177         if (!v3d->layact)
00178             v3d->layact = 1;
00179 
00180         if (toggle && v3d->lay == ((1 << 20) - 1)) {
00181             /* return to active layer only */
00182             v3d->lay = v3d->layact;
00183 
00184             view3d_layers_editmode_ensure(scene, v3d);
00185         }
00186         else {
00187             v3d->lay |= (1 << 20) - 1;
00188         }       
00189     }
00190     else {
00191         int bit;
00192         nr--;
00193 
00194         if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend")) {
00195             if (toggle && v3d->lay & (1 << nr) && (v3d->lay & ~(1 << nr)))
00196                 v3d->lay &= ~(1 << nr);
00197             else
00198                 v3d->lay |= (1 << nr);
00199         }
00200         else {
00201             v3d->lay = (1 << nr);
00202         }
00203 
00204         view3d_layers_editmode_ensure(scene, v3d);
00205 
00206         /* set active layer, ensure to always have one */
00207         if (v3d->lay & (1 << nr))
00208             v3d->layact = 1 << nr;
00209         else if ((v3d->lay & v3d->layact) == 0) {
00210             for (bit = 0; bit < 32; bit++) {
00211                 if (v3d->lay & (1 << bit)) {
00212                     v3d->layact = 1 << bit;
00213                     break;
00214                 }
00215             }
00216         }
00217     }
00218     
00219     if (v3d->scenelock) handle_view3d_lock(C);
00220     
00221     DAG_on_visible_update(CTX_data_main(C), FALSE);
00222 
00223     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00224     
00225     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00226 }
00227 
00228 /* applies shift and alt, lazy coding or ok? :) */
00229 /* the local per-keymap-entry keymap will solve it */
00230 static int view3d_layers_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00231 {
00232     if (event->ctrl || event->oskey)
00233         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00234     
00235     if (event->shift)
00236         RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "extend", TRUE);
00237     else
00238         RNA_boolean_set(op->ptr, "extend", FALSE);
00239     
00240     if (event->alt) {
00241         int nr = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "nr") + 10;
00242         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "nr", nr);
00243     }
00244     view3d_layers_exec(C, op);
00245     
00246     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00247 }
00248 
00249 static int view3d_layers_poll(bContext *C)
00250 {
00251     return (ED_operator_view3d_active(C) && CTX_wm_view3d(C)->localvd == NULL);
00252 }
00253 
00254 void VIEW3D_OT_layers(wmOperatorType *ot)
00255 {
00256     /* identifiers */
00257     ot->name = "Layers";
00258     ot->description = "Toggle layer(s) visibility";
00259     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_layers";
00260     
00261     /* api callbacks */
00262     ot->invoke = view3d_layers_invoke;
00263     ot->exec = view3d_layers_exec;
00264     ot->poll = view3d_layers_poll;
00265     
00266     /* flags */
00267     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00268     
00269     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "nr", 1, 0, 20, "Number", "The layer number to set, zero for all layers", 0, 20);
00270     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0, "Extend", "Add this layer to the current view layers");
00271     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "toggle", 1, "Toggle", "Toggle the layer");
00272 }
00273 
00274 static int modeselect_addmode(char *str, const char *title, int id, int icon)
00275 {
00276     static char formatstr[] = "|%s %%x%d %%i%d";
00277 
00278     return sprintf(str, formatstr, IFACE_(title), id, icon);
00279 }
00280 
00281 static char *view3d_modeselect_pup(Scene *scene)
00282 {
00283     Object *ob = OBACT;
00284     static char string[512];
00285     const char *title = IFACE_("Mode: %t");
00286     char *str = string;
00287 
00288     BLI_strncpy(str, title, sizeof(string));
00289 
00290     str += modeselect_addmode(str, N_("Object Mode"), OB_MODE_OBJECT, ICON_OBJECT_DATA);
00291 
00292     if (ob == NULL || ob->data == NULL) return string;
00293     if (ob->id.lib) return string;
00294 
00295     if (!((ID *)ob->data)->lib) {
00296         /* if active object is editable */
00297         if (ELEM6(ob->type, OB_MESH, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_FONT, OB_MBALL, OB_LATTICE)) {
00298             str += modeselect_addmode(str, N_("Edit Mode"), OB_MODE_EDIT, ICON_EDITMODE_HLT);
00299         }
00300         else if (ob->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
00301             if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)
00302                 str += modeselect_addmode(str, N_("Edit Mode"), OB_MODE_EDIT | OB_MODE_POSE, ICON_EDITMODE_HLT);
00303             else
00304                 str += modeselect_addmode(str, N_("Edit Mode"), OB_MODE_EDIT, ICON_EDITMODE_HLT);
00305         }
00306 
00307         if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
00308 
00309             str += modeselect_addmode(str, N_("Sculpt Mode"), OB_MODE_SCULPT, ICON_SCULPTMODE_HLT);
00310             str += modeselect_addmode(str, N_("Vertex Paint"), OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT, ICON_VPAINT_HLT);
00311             str += modeselect_addmode(str, N_("Texture Paint"), OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT, ICON_TPAINT_HLT);
00312             str += modeselect_addmode(str, N_("Weight Paint"), OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT, ICON_WPAINT_HLT);
00313         }
00314     }
00315 
00316     /* if active object is an armature */
00317     if (ob->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
00318         str += modeselect_addmode(str, N_("Pose Mode"), OB_MODE_POSE, ICON_POSE_HLT);
00319     }
00320 
00321     if (ob->particlesystem.first ||
00322         modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_Cloth) ||
00323         modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_Softbody))
00324     {
00325         str += modeselect_addmode(str, N_("Particle Mode"), OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT, ICON_PARTICLEMODE);
00326     }
00327     (void)str;
00328     return (string);
00329 }
00330 
00331 
00332 static void do_view3d_header_buttons(bContext *C, void *UNUSED(arg), int event)
00333 {
00334     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00335     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
00336     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00337     View3D *v3d = sa->spacedata.first;
00338     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00339     BMEditMesh *em = NULL;
00340     int ctrl = win->eventstate->ctrl, shift = win->eventstate->shift;
00341     PointerRNA props_ptr;
00342     
00343     if (obedit && obedit->type == OB_MESH) {
00344         em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00345     }
00346     /* watch it: if sa->win does not exist, check that when calling direct drawing routines */
00347 
00348     switch (event) {
00349         case B_REDR:
00350             ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00351             break;
00352 
00353         case B_MODESELECT:
00354             WM_operator_properties_create(&props_ptr, "OBJECT_OT_mode_set");
00355             RNA_enum_set(&props_ptr, "mode", v3d->modeselect);
00356             WM_operator_name_call(C, "OBJECT_OT_mode_set", WM_OP_EXEC_REGION_WIN, &props_ptr);
00357             WM_operator_properties_free(&props_ptr);
00358             break;
00359 
00360         case B_SEL_VERT:
00361             if (em) {
00362                 if (shift == 0 || em->selectmode == 0)
00363                     em->selectmode = SCE_SELECT_VERTEX;
00364                 ts->selectmode = em->selectmode;
00365                 EDBM_selectmode_set(em);
00366                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
00367                 ED_undo_push(C, "Selectmode Set: Vertex");
00368             }
00369             break;
00370         case B_SEL_EDGE:
00371             if (em) {
00372                 if (shift == 0 || em->selectmode == 0) {
00373                     if ( (em->selectmode ^ SCE_SELECT_EDGE) == SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) {
00374                         if (ctrl) EDBM_selectmode_convert(em, SCE_SELECT_VERTEX, SCE_SELECT_EDGE);
00375                     }
00376                     em->selectmode = SCE_SELECT_EDGE;
00377                 }
00378                 ts->selectmode = em->selectmode;
00379                 EDBM_selectmode_set(em);
00380                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
00381                 ED_undo_push(C, "Selectmode Set: Edge");
00382             }
00383             break;
00384         case B_SEL_FACE:
00385             if (em) {
00386                 if (shift == 0 || em->selectmode == 0) {
00387                     if ( ((ts->selectmode ^ SCE_SELECT_FACE) == SCE_SELECT_VERTEX) || ((ts->selectmode ^ SCE_SELECT_FACE) == SCE_SELECT_EDGE)) {
00388                         if (ctrl) EDBM_selectmode_convert(em, (ts->selectmode ^ SCE_SELECT_FACE), SCE_SELECT_FACE);
00389                     }
00390                     em->selectmode = SCE_SELECT_FACE;
00391                 }
00392                 ts->selectmode = em->selectmode;
00393                 EDBM_selectmode_set(em);
00394                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GEOM | ND_SELECT, obedit->data);
00395                 ED_undo_push(C, "Selectmode Set: Face");
00396             }
00397             break;
00398 
00399         case B_MAN_TRANS:
00400             if (shift == 0 || v3d->twtype == 0) {
00401                 v3d->twtype = V3D_MANIP_TRANSLATE;
00402             }
00403             ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00404             break;
00405         case B_MAN_ROT:
00406             if (shift == 0 || v3d->twtype == 0) {
00407                 v3d->twtype = V3D_MANIP_ROTATE;
00408             }
00409             ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00410             break;
00411         case B_MAN_SCALE:
00412             if (shift == 0 || v3d->twtype == 0) {
00413                 v3d->twtype = V3D_MANIP_SCALE;
00414             }
00415             ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00416             break;
00417         case B_NDOF:
00418             ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00419             break;
00420         case B_MAN_MODE:
00421             ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00422             break;
00423         default:
00424             break;
00425     }
00426 }
00427 
00428 /* Returns the icon associated with an object mode */
00429 static int object_mode_icon(int mode)
00430 {
00431     EnumPropertyItem *item = object_mode_items;
00432     
00433     while (item->name != NULL) {
00434         if (item->value == mode)
00435             return item->icon;
00436         ++item;
00437     }
00438 
00439     return ICON_OBJECT_DATAMODE;
00440 }
00441 
00442 void uiTemplateEditModeSelection(uiLayout *layout, struct bContext *C)
00443 {
00444     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00445     uiBlock *block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00446 
00447     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_view3d_header_buttons, NULL);
00448 
00449     if (obedit && (obedit->type == OB_MESH)) {
00450         BMEditMesh *em = BMEdit_FromObject(obedit);
00451         uiLayout *row;
00452 
00453         row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00454         block = uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00455         uiDefIconButBitS(block, TOG, SCE_SELECT_VERTEX, B_SEL_VERT, ICON_VERTEXSEL, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, &em->selectmode, 1.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "Vertex select - Shift-Click for multiple modes");
00456         uiDefIconButBitS(block, TOG, SCE_SELECT_EDGE, B_SEL_EDGE, ICON_EDGESEL, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, &em->selectmode, 1.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "Edge select - Shift-Click for multiple modes");
00457         uiDefIconButBitS(block, TOG, SCE_SELECT_FACE, B_SEL_FACE, ICON_FACESEL, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, &em->selectmode, 1.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "Face select - Shift-Click for multiple modes");
00458     }
00459 }
00460 
00461 void uiTemplateHeader3D(uiLayout *layout, struct bContext *C)
00462 {
00463     bScreen *screen = CTX_wm_screen(C);
00464     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00465     View3D *v3d = sa->spacedata.first;
00466     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00467     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
00468     PointerRNA v3dptr, toolsptr, sceneptr;
00469     Object *ob = OBACT;
00470     Object *obedit = CTX_data_edit_object(C);
00471     uiBlock *block;
00472     uiBut *but;
00473     uiLayout *row;
00474     const float dpi_fac = UI_DPI_FAC;
00475     int is_paint = 0;
00476     
00477     RNA_pointer_create(&screen->id, &RNA_SpaceView3D, v3d, &v3dptr);    
00478     RNA_pointer_create(&scene->id, &RNA_ToolSettings, ts, &toolsptr);
00479     RNA_pointer_create(&scene->id, &RNA_Scene, scene, &sceneptr);
00480 
00481     block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00482     uiBlockSetHandleFunc(block, do_view3d_header_buttons, NULL);
00483 
00484     /* other buttons: */
00485     uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSS);
00486     
00487     /* mode */
00488     if (ob) {
00489         v3d->modeselect = ob->mode;
00490         is_paint = ELEM4(ob->mode, OB_MODE_SCULPT, OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT, OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT, OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT);
00491     }
00492     else {
00493         v3d->modeselect = OB_MODE_OBJECT;
00494     }
00495 
00496     row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00497     uiDefIconTextButS(block, MENU, B_MODESELECT, object_mode_icon(v3d->modeselect), view3d_modeselect_pup(scene),
00498                       0, 0, 126 * dpi_fac, UI_UNIT_Y, &(v3d->modeselect), 0, 0, 0, 0, TIP_("Mode"));
00499     
00500     /* Draw type */
00501     uiItemR(layout, &v3dptr, "viewport_shade", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00502 
00503     if (obedit == NULL && is_paint) {
00504         /* Manipulators aren't used in paint modes */
00505         if (!ELEM(ob->mode, OB_MODE_SCULPT, OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT)) {
00506             /* masks aren't used for sculpt and particle painting */
00507             PointerRNA meshptr;
00508 
00509             RNA_pointer_create(&ob->id, &RNA_Mesh, ob->data, &meshptr);
00510             if (ob->mode & (OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT | OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT)) {
00511                 uiItemR(layout, &meshptr, "use_paint_mask", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00512             }
00513             else {
00514                 row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00515                 uiItemR(row, &meshptr, "use_paint_mask", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00516                 uiItemR(row, &meshptr, "use_paint_mask_vertex", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00517             }
00518         }
00519     }
00520     else {
00521         const char *str_menu;
00522 
00523         row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00524         uiItemR(row, &v3dptr, "pivot_point", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00525 
00526         /* pose/object only however we want to allow in weight paint mode too
00527          * so don't be totally strict and just check not-editmode for now */
00528         if (obedit == NULL) {
00529             uiItemR(row, &v3dptr, "use_pivot_point_align", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00530         }
00531 
00532         /* Transform widget / manipulators */
00533         row = uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00534         uiItemR(row, &v3dptr, "show_manipulator", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00535         block = uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00536         
00537         if (v3d->twflag & V3D_USE_MANIPULATOR) {
00538             but = uiDefIconButBitC(block, TOG, V3D_MANIP_TRANSLATE, B_MAN_TRANS, ICON_MAN_TRANS, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, &v3d->twtype, 1.0, 0.0, 0, 0, TIP_("Translate manipulator - Shift-Click for multiple modes"));
00539             uiButClearFlag(but, UI_BUT_UNDO); /* skip undo on screen buttons */
00540             but = uiDefIconButBitC(block, TOG, V3D_MANIP_ROTATE, B_MAN_ROT, ICON_MAN_ROT, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, &v3d->twtype, 1.0, 0.0, 0, 0, TIP_("Rotate manipulator - Shift-Click for multiple modes"));
00541             uiButClearFlag(but, UI_BUT_UNDO); /* skip undo on screen buttons */
00542             but = uiDefIconButBitC(block, TOG, V3D_MANIP_SCALE, B_MAN_SCALE, ICON_MAN_SCALE, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, &v3d->twtype, 1.0, 0.0, 0, 0, TIP_("Scale manipulator - Shift-Click for multiple modes"));
00543             uiButClearFlag(but, UI_BUT_UNDO); /* skip undo on screen buttons */
00544         }
00545             
00546         if (v3d->twmode > (BIF_countTransformOrientation(C) - 1) + V3D_MANIP_CUSTOM) {
00547             v3d->twmode = 0;
00548         }
00549             
00550         str_menu = BIF_menustringTransformOrientation(C, "Orientation");
00551         but = uiDefButC(block, MENU, B_MAN_MODE, str_menu, 0, 0, 70 * dpi_fac, UI_UNIT_Y, &v3d->twmode, 0, 0, 0, 0, TIP_("Transform Orientation"));
00552         uiButClearFlag(but, UI_BUT_UNDO); /* skip undo on screen buttons */
00553         MEM_freeN((void *)str_menu);
00554     }
00555 
00556     if (obedit == NULL && v3d->localvd == NULL) {
00557         unsigned int ob_lay = ob ? ob->lay : 0;
00558 
00559         /* Layers */
00560         uiTemplateLayers(layout, v3d->scenelock ? &sceneptr : &v3dptr, "layers", &v3dptr, "layers_used", ob_lay);
00561 
00562         /* Scene lock */
00563         uiItemR(layout, &v3dptr, "lock_camera_and_layers", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00564     }
00565     
00566     uiTemplateEditModeSelection(layout, C);
00567 }
